Apps4Fashion welcomes Quapi Kidswear

‹ back to news overview
Apps4Fashion welcomes Quapi Kidswear. Quapi will start using our sales app for their sales team as well as our B2B web portal to service their B2B customers to see what is available on stock, to place re-orders, review order statuses, open invoices etc on a 24/7 basis.
Next to Quapi other kids brands like Vingino, Scotch R'ebelle, Scotch Shrunk, Oilily, Lcee, Le Chic, Moodstreet, NoNo, Bellaire, Kidz-art, Flo, LT01, Marmar, LeBig, Someone, and kids collections of Gaastra, O'Neill, Brunotti, McGregor, Peak Performance, Charlie Choe, Circle of Trust are using the Apps4Fashion sales tools as well.

Quapi represent modern and contemporary kids wear with fresh looking colorful designs. Clothing with the right fit, which is comfortable and affordable. 

Apps4Fashion is the leading mobile sales platform for Fashion, Sportswear, Kidswear Shoe, Body Fashion, Accessory, Home & Living brands, agents and distributors. Currently over 300 international brands and suppliers are using our mobile B2B sales platform. We are happy to explain you more about Apps4Fashion and demonstrate what it can do for you.

For more information apps4fashion.com or email to sales@apptitude.nl
